title: Opportunities
introDescription: The Opportunities page curates jobs, partnerships, grants, and collaborations from entities in our ecosystem. Sign in to browse and apply.
upgradeToMemberToPostOpportunities: Upgrade to Member to Post Opportunities
subscriberUpgradeMessage: As a subscriber, you can view opportunities but need to upgrade to member status to post your own.

confidentialOpportunityDescription: This opportunity contains confidential information and is only visible to authorized users.
